oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of James Lafayette Parham
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tintype of Pvt. James L. Parham, Co. A, 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA. Parham was from Bledsoe County, Tennessee and joined the Union army on June 10, 1862 at Camp Dick Robinson, Ky. He was listed as "sick in hospital" at both Knoxville and Philadelphia, Tennesse at various times in 1863 and 1864 and was discharged in North Carolina in June 1865. He died in Missouri sometime after 1900.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Parham, James Lafayette
